text: Is it possible to use a different global footer module in place of the one that ships with a Theme?

Would be awesome feature for Themes - as an editor - to be able to create Sections, Rows and Columns on the fly. Right now I'm running into an issue where I have a Section with Columns inside and need those columns to live within a Row. I think my only option is to pull in an unrelated module which has this hierarchy, then remove all the module elements until I'm left with the Section/Row/Col structure. #feedback
Hey there David, can you explain the situation/use-case you have where you want the containing elements but wouldnâ€™t want modules in them?
